name: Testing Testing
description:
Test and challenge your brains with over 10 different puzzles, it is an adventure you should not miss!
______________________________________________

Welcome to the Testing Company! "Here at the Testing Company we test average human beings in the name of science by making them solve and complete puzzles!


Estimated playing time: ~30-50min. 
Depends on the players brain cell amount.
________________________________________________

Try out the Demo:
https://tunyfox.itch.io/testingtesting-demo 
The demo has 5 different puzzles for you to try
FOR FREE before trying the real deal!
